resources.string: Access to the location service is required for the \'my location\' feature, which shows your current location on the map.

This app requires location permission to enable the \'my location\' layer. Please try again and grant access to use the location.\nIf the permission has been permanently denied, it can be enabled from the System Settings > Apps > \'Google Maps API Demos\'.
Location permission is required for this app.
"Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."
Location services are disabled or not yet found
Please wait till location will be more accurate
